question: Which government has informed the legislative assembly that the state's sex ratio has dropped to 899 in 2016 from 960 in the previous year?
explanation: Maharashtra government informed the legislative assembly that the state's sex ratio has dropped to 899 in 2016 from 960 in the previous year (number of girls per 1,000 boys). Health Minister Deepak Sawant said that the state government has appointed 608 officials for effective implementation of the Pre-Conception and Pre-Natal Diagnostic Techniques (PCPNDT) Act.
